name: Treasure Punks
description:
Your choice is simple! Do you grab three more items or do you keep what you have? Treasure Punks is a game of pushing your luck. The first player to grab 13 treasures wins the match. Mind your grabbing though - there are skulls hidden in the pile! Disturb three skulls and lose your points!

Current features:

*Quick & Easy Gameplay
*Single Player versus the computer
*Pass and Play/Hotseat Multiplayer for up to four people

Coming soon:
Cross platform multiplayer! (Status - have the backend stuff working, just need to integrate into the games!)

Future Plans:
Add a few characters with a once-per-game power. Add Bluetooth multiplayer for Android.
